fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: Generally, a healer is recommended at C0, C2 and onwards. At C1, a shielder may be preferred. Any team with Bennett should not have Jean, due to Gaming being unable to trigger reactions. Iansan can replace Bennett in most teams, and give him more mobility. However, Bennett will still outperform Iansan.
